title: Quiz: FQE Feb 2020 Past Paper
description: Final Qualifying Examination from Feb 2020 covering data quality, indices, and notification procedures.

questions.question: The following are aspect of data quality of birth and death except
questions.explanation: Accessibility is about use, not inherent data quality (like accuracy/timeliness).

questions.question: Which one of the following departments do not need notification of the patient's admission from the waiting list?
questions.explanation: Bed bureau manages the admission, so they already know.

questions.question: The following are data entry process except
questions.explanation: Feedback is an output/control, not entry step.

questions.question: The state of not being emotional in an emergency situation is a state of being
Explain some of the problems associated with lack of proper records management in a health facility (Long Answer)
questions.explanation:
Problems:

  1. Poor Patient Care (Errors)
  2. Delays in Treatment
  3. Legal Liability (No evidence)
  4. Financial Loss (Rejected claims)
  5. Poor Planning
  6. Breach of Confidentiality
  7. Research Hindrance
